website_summaries.verdict: One of the best LED moving light options for anyone wanting a self-contained, portable unit.
pros: Round light head has 7 individually adjustable LED lights with full RGB control
Automatic beat sync feature flashes the light in time with music
Easy control via the LCD display
cons: The automatic movement can reset if the light is knocked or touched during use

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Though this light is for professionals, it is also ready to go as soon as you plug it in. The settings menu allows control over every aspect of the light, including x- and y-range adjustment, speed, color, strobe frequency, etc. I honestly set it to fast and bright and let the kids have fun. It turned my living room into a dance hall instantly. Now my kids' friends want to come over to dance. As far as quality goes, this light is very solid and very, very bright. There are no serviceable parts so it is put together to stay together. I highly recommend this stage light to anyone looking to party-up a room or gathering easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Fronzaglia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, light, small but bright!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun light. Video shows it in DJ style mode - super fun and bright. I’m using it in a. Theater for color wash. It’s great - using DMX I can control where it goes on the stage and the color . White is super bright and can be used as a “spot” if you need it. Not a focused spot but can surely highlight an area of the stage.
customer_reviews.author: Motivate Science

customer_reviews.title: Moving Stage Light.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a DJ for over 30 years I use a light controller and can run up to 8 lights at a time. I normally DJ for 60-200 people in a small to medium size hall.The Pyle PDJLT50 is a very powerful light lots of color and functions.I found it harder to program then others but works well in small and medium size rooms.. I think it would work great in a larger place it has great movement but you need to make sure light is programed and placed so it doesn't hit people in the eyes. Great powerful light.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun, but keep it away from spill areas.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a dj and just wanted to use this for my kids to have a dance party. The instructions are a little cryptic, but it's very easy to use. Just plug it in and press the mode button.... Let the dance party begin! If you actually start pressing buttons while you're looking at the function map they start to make since. Also, if you plan on taking this to a party, mount/place it above or away from where people place their drinks. The electronics don't have any real protection from spilling so keep away from the bar top.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great light!! We have loved this thing and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool light!! I surprised my daughter with this light as she is all into karaoke and dancing like she is on a stage. She came home and i had some music playing and this thing throwing light everywhere....and she loved it! It was super easy to set up and we have definitely put it to good use! It is well made and rotates and moves like it was one of those professional ones at a concert. We love it and for the money it is a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger 63

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, new to moving head stage lights. Only real downside so far is documentation. May be fine for someone that knows about DMX, but being new to me, had a learning curve. Seems bright, hope it works for my application
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Bought these for a little side business of mine, and they work PERFECTLY. I haven't ran it via DMX, but I ran it in sound mode, and they work perfectly. Quality seems to be of a heavy plastic, and very durable. I will definitely purchase more in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: TampaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are almost worthless . The digital readout on the side is hard to figure out .
customer_reviews.author: Fade

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the quality of this stage light
customer_reviews.text: Wow, lots of colors! I'm very happy with the quality of this stage light! This light and the others in the series have all been surprisingly sturdy. I really do love the lighting effects and it's programming abilities. It's nice and bright, very powerful LEDs... very cool stage light!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Good powerful light system!
customer_reviews.text: Great Light, will work wonders for my next Halloween Haunt 😀! Well constructed and arrived fast. Exactly what I needed for my next haunt. Black light will work wonders for some of my props!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Buttazzoni

product_meta.title: Party Rotating Moving Stage Light - for Professional DJ Dance Show Performance with RGB Color LED Projector Bulbs, Flashing Disco Strobe, Beat Sync Motion Effect and DMX Control - Pyle PDJLT50
product_meta.description:
Pyle Model : PDJLT50

MULTI-COLOR DJ LED STAGE LIGHT SYSTEM
MULTI-COLOR LED STAGE LIGHT - DJ SOUND & STUDIO LIGHTING SYSTEM
Features:Multi-Color Lighting SystemUsed by DJs & Vocal Stage PerformersLED Illumination Light SourceHigh-Powered Electronic Plug-in DesignSimple & Hassle-Free OperationMotorized Automatic Mode Movement AbilityConfigurable Horizontal & Vertical Light AlignmentDigital LCD Display with Button ControlsColors: Red, Green, Blue, White (RGBW)Electronic Strobe Mode with Pulsing & Randomized Light PatternsAdjustable & Configurable Lighting FX Effects SettingsSpeed Adjustable Strobe Effect IlluminationDimmer Configurable SettingsPerfect for On-Stage DJ Shows, Concerts & Studio Performances

What’s in the Box:LED Stage Lighting System Power Cable

Technical Specs:Light Source Power: 100 Watt Bulb Type: (7) Focused FX 4-in-1 x 10W, RGBWConnector Type: Digital Multiplex (DMX) StandardDMX Channels: 9/14-ChannelDimmer Adjustment Levels: 1-255, (0-100%)Horizontal / Vertical Alignment Levels: 1-255Motor Speed Adjustment Levels: 1-255Power Cable Length: 3.94 ft.Fuse: T6.3Voltage Power: 110/240V, 50/60Hz Unit Dimensions (L x W x H): 6.5’’ x 6.7’’ x 9.7’’ -inches
Any party is dull and boring without impressive lighting effects that’s why Pyle brings you PDJLT50 LED Moving Head Light! Turn your party, club, or concert to a blast with this multicolored LED stage light! It features bright RGBW colored lights and has Pulsing & Randomized Light Patterns, Pan & Tilt Head Movement, and Automatic Mode Movement Ability control modes, light speed is also adjustable depending on your preference.
feature_bullets: FULL AXIS ROTATING HEAD: This moving night disco / stage light rotates in pattern to change the position of the spotlight from the floor to the wall and even the ceiling. You can easily adjust the pan pattern from a variety of built in presets

AUTOMATIC BEAT SYNC: These indoor outdoor party lights are a great alternative for a disco ball. Has a built in mic that detects the BPM of the music playing and adjusts the speed of the light pattern to sync w/ the music for an awesome dance party

DIGITAL LCD DISPLAY: Change mode, pattern, speed or projection color of the portable LED stage light from the LCD display. Switch between projector strobe motion effect and the gradual dj facade flow between red, blue, white, purple, green colors

100W LONG LIFE COLOR RGB: This professional DJ lighting system contains 7 focused FX 4-in-1 x 10W RGBW bulbs providing the full color spectrum for more impressive light show. The bulb is bright and powerful and will bring life to any dance party room

DMX CONTROLLABLE: Attach a standard DMX cable and control the light’s pattern from a small centralized DMX system. Combine this light with any other Pyle light and synchronize multiple moving lights to work together from one controller

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars17 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
